task.title: Viewing messaging groups by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view messaging groups by using the group list command on the command line.

taskbody.context: You can view messaging groups by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view messaging groups, see .The commands must be capitalized as shown.

step.cmd: To view a list of all the messaging groups, enter the following command:
To view a specific messaging group, enter the following command:
step.info:
group list "GroupID=GroupID" "Type=Messaging"Where:
GroupID Specifies the group ID of the group that you want to view.

taskbody.example:
The following example shows viewing a list of messaging groups: imaserver group list "Type=Messaging" GroupID: Group1 Description: First group
GroupID: Group2 Description: Second group
